name: All Imaging Report
query:
SELECT 
    S.patient AS "Patient:Data:100", 
    S.patient_name AS "Patient Name:Data:250", 
    S.posting_date AS "Date:Date:150", 
    COALESCE(S.ref_practitioner, S.oustside) AS "Doctor:Data:200", 
    I.item_code AS "Service Name:Data:250", 
    I.Item_group AS "Service Type", 
    I.qty AS Qty,
    R.section AS "Radiology Section",  -- Add Radiology Section here
    S.owner AS "Owner"  -- Add Owner column from tabSales Invoice
   
FROM 
    `tabSales Invoice` S
JOIN 
    `tabSales Invoice Item` I ON S.name = I.parent
LEFT JOIN
    `tabRadiology` R ON S.patient = R.patient  -- Join Radiology table, assuming 'patient' is a common column
WHERE 
    R.docstatus = 1
    AND S.posting_date BETWEEN %(Start_date)s AND %(End_date)s
    And S.is_return =  0
    AND I.Item_group IN ("Imaging", "ECO", "ECG")
